name: evilschnauzer.exe
description:
Disclaimer: This is a old game that I've made months ago in a summer break, I'm not too fond of it anymore but if you wanna play it, then go ahead.

Based off of The Evil Schnauzer and Smile Dog - The game by KaloyPlay, this is made with RPG Maker MV, with the FPLE plugin made by Masked!

Warning: The following game contains jumpscares and gore, you also probably require DirectPlay to experience the 3D effect.

You guide a black cat named Princess throughout the mazes into escaping her nightmares as she is cursed by The Evil Schnauzer, you must avoid The Evil Schnauzer before he gets you.
